mods.name: Agent's Individual Item Kits
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: 1,396 individual item kits organized into 73 categories. Fair pricing based on complexity (5-300 credits). Complete Workshop expansion for precise inventory management.

mods.name: Agent's BioLab
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: All 10 Bio Lab Legendary weapons available in the Workshop. Includes Frontier Revolver, Kinetic Rifle, Tactical Bow, and 7 more. 1,000 Exotics each.

mods.name: Culinex Food Boost Fix
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Fixes Chef's Backpack 25% food effectiveness boost to work on all 158 cooked foods. Includes raw chicken butchery recipe.

mods.name: Dev Tools Kit
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Unlocks 10 hidden developer tools including Thor's Hammer (fly mode), Transform Tool, Destroy Tool, Inspection Tool, Fireball, Pyromancy Flame, and more. All free to craft!

mods.name: FastProcessing All 5x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: All crafting and processing 5x faster. 3,448 recipes including base game, Workshop Recyclers, and Hidden Building Pieces. Use only ONE FastProcessing variant.

mods.name: FastProcessing All 10x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: All crafting and processing 10x faster. 3,448 recipes including base game, Workshop Recyclers, and Hidden Building Pieces. Use only ONE FastProcessing variant.

mods.name: FastProcessing All 15x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: All crafting and processing 15x faster. 3,448 recipes including base game, Workshop Recyclers, and Hidden Building Pieces. Use only ONE FastProcessing variant.

mods.name: FastProcessing All 25x
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: All crafting and processing 25x faster. 3,448 recipes including base game, Workshop Recyclers, and Hidden Building Pieces. Use only ONE FastProcessing variant.

mods.name: FastProcessing Instant
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: All crafting and processing instant. 3,448 recipes including base game, Workshop Recyclers, and Hidden Building Pieces. Zero wait time. Use only ONE FastProcessing variant.

mods.name: Indestructible Tools & Weapons
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Maximum durability on all tools, weapons, armor, buildings, doors, and crafting stations. 191 items modified to never break.

mods.name: No Food Spoilage
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Prevents all food items and volatile substances from spoiling. Includes 8 composter recipes for optional manual conversion to Spoiled Meat.

mods.name: Modular Affliction Adjuster
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Comprehensive affliction adjustment - reduces stat penalties by ~50%, extends escalation times by ~50%, and reduces damage over time by ~50%. Covers all 80+ player afflictions.

mods.name: Modular Buff Enhancer
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Comprehensive buff enhancement - 83 core buffs plus 156 food buffs, all boosted by ~50%. Stronger tonics, better food effects, enhanced bed healing, and more.

mods.name: Hidden Building Pieces
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Unlocks 54 hidden diagonal and curved building pieces for 9 materials: Concrete, Glass, Clay Brick, Stone, Scoria, Tempered Glass, Scoria Brick, Stone Brick, and Ice. All pieces now craftable including Ice.

mods.name: Workshop Recyclers
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Two recycling machines based on Biofuel Bio-Cleaner (T3) and Organic Residue Cleanser (T4). 1,625 recipes returning 100% of original Workshop costs. Hammer repairable.

mods.name: Always Show Buildings On Map
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: Always shows player-built structures on the map and minimap without requiring radar or special stats.

mods.name: Turret Variants
mods.author: AgentKush
mods.description: 15 new automated turret variants with unique firing patterns. Includes Crossbow, Bow, Sniper, Assault Rifle, SMG, Javelin, Flamethrower, Rock, Minigun, Rifle, Pistol, Shotblaster, Rapid Crossbow, Storm, and Heavy Sniper turrets.
